original_text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his father Uzziah did: howbeit he entered not into the temple of the Lord. And the people did yet corruptly.
korean_text: 요담이 그의 아버지 웃시야의 모든 행위대로 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하였으나 여호와의 성전에는 들어가지 아니하였고 백성은 여전히 부패하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was right
in the sight of the Lord
according to all that his father Uzziah did
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 웃시야가 행한 모든 것에 따라

sentences.original_text: howbeit he entered not into the temple of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 주의 전에 들어가지 않았고

sentences.original_text: And the people did yet corruptly
